svg.title: Most commented articles on Hacker News of all time.

g.title: Activists who embrace nuclear power
When Bitcoin miners take over a town (2018)
YouTube blocked chess channel after mistaken detection of racial slurs
Apparent hackers behind Kia ransomware attack demand millions in Bitcoin
The modern packager’s security nightmare
Please do not put IP addresses into DNS MX records
Mistakes I've Made as an Engineering Manager
Feedback Welcome: I am developing an e-paper calendar as a consumer product
Formalising Mathematics: An Introduction
Commenting vs. Making
‘It just blew fire’: Kauai woman watched as an engine fell apart on flight 328
Diplomacy: The Board Game of the Alpha Nerds (2014)
Silent Running: The sci-fi that predicted modern crises
TransferWise: World, Meet Wise
Project Xanadu
I paid for Spotify playlist placements so you don’t have to
Show HN: Ad Network for Sideprojects
Cross-Database Queries in SQLite
2020 Industrial Capabilities Report to Congress [pdf]
What Is Huffman Coding?
Doomsday Ships Were Ready to Ride Out Nuclear Armageddon Before Doomsday Planes
Reconstructing the Menu of a Pub in Ancient Pompeii
Passerine: An extensible and expressive new programming language
A Data Pipeline Is a Materialized View
When Engineers Were Humanists
Super Mario 64 Decompilation
Show HN: Turn scripts into fine-tuned voices via Wiki markups
Nuklear: A cross-platform GUI library in C
Replit (YC W18) is hiring to make computing more accessible
Biocrusts Are an Entire World Beneath Our Feet
